thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Diodes Inc Q4 Gaap Loss Per Share $0.62

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diodes Inc Q4 Gaap Loss Per Share $0.62
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Diodes Inc:
* ORPORATED REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.42 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.62 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 15.7 PERCENT TO $268.4 MILLION * Q1 2018 ‍REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO RANGE BETWEEN $261 MILLION AND $277 MILLION​
* ‍EXPECT Q1 2018 GAAP GROSS MARGIN TO BE 36.0 PERCENT, PLUS OR MINUS 1 PERCENT​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.39, REVENUE VIEW $270.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
